text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump #TrumpSurrender Trump*, is bored with covid19 & wants to go to bedminster to golf every weekend, his handlers have been telling him he can’t do that during the crisis so he’ll declare it over & Americans will die at an alarming rate. https://t.co/JV3OHBGfOw
